CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Marketing Department?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Marketing Department is arc {Finance Department}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Finance Department?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Finance Department is arc {Marketing Department}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Admin and Facilities} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Marketing Department} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Operations Department to Finance Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Admin and Facilities to Marketing Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Operations Department to Admin and Facilities in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Admin and Facilities and Operations Department in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Admin and Facilities and Operations Department is {155}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Operations Department and Admin and Facilities in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Operations Department and Admin and Facilities is {122}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Marketing Department?
SC.A: The total flow output from Marketing Department is {574}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Finance Department?
SC.A: The total flow input by Finance Department is {350}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 218? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {793} from {Admin and Facilities} to {Marketing Department}, a flow of {392} from {Marketing Department} to {Admin and Facilities}, a flow of {255} from {Finance Department} to {Marketing Department}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 81? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {77} from {Admin and Facilities} to {Finance Department}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 117 and 168? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {155} from {Operations Department} to {Admin and Facilities}, a flow of {122} from {Admin and Facilities} to {Operations Department}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Operations Department to Admin and Facilities or from Marketing Department to Finance Department?
NC.A: The flow from {Marketing Department} to {Finance Department} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Marketing Department to Finance Department, from Admin and Facilities to Marketing Department, or from Admin and Facilities to Finance Department?
NC.A: The flow from {Admin and Facilities} to {Marketing Department} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Admin and Facilities}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Admin and Facilities} and {Marketing Department}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Finance Department, Arc Marketing Department, Arc Admin and Facilities, Arc Operations Department}.
